title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.15 - Food product thermometers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.15 - Food product thermometers

State Regulations

Metal stem-type numerically scaled indicating
thermometers, accurate to plus or minus 2°F (congruent to plus or minus 1°C)
shall be provided and used to assure attainment and maintenance of proper
temperatures during preparation of all potentially hazardous
foods. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-2.15

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
